system.description: Your connection to the veil is unstable, causing reality to occasionally fracture around you.
system.mechanic: Random reality glitches occur around you. Roll 1d6 each session: 1-2: Minor inconvenience, 3-4: No effect, 5-6: Beneficial anomaly. Can intentionally trigger a reality fracture once per session to reroll any check (yours or an enemy's).
